prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Drums, Piano, Bass, Guitar, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Pipe, Drums, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but without the Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Drums, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Pipe, Drums, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, excluding the Synth Pad.
